title: Antonio Brown, James Harden, Aaron Rodgers and the NFL Coaching Carousel
itunes:title: Antonio Brown, James Harden, Aaron Rodgers and the NFL Coaching Carousel
description:
Colin tells Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Antonio Brown what his New Year's resolution should be. Colin explains why high usage players like James Harden fade when it is most important. Colin doesn't think that the Cleveland Browns head coaching job is better than the Denver Broncos opening. And Colin says that Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers is more like Ben Roethlisberger than Tom Brady. Guests include; Doug Gottlieb, Greg Jennings and Mark Schlereth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
